src:
Jorge Lorenzo: MotoGP 2019 Masa Terburuk dalam Karier Saya
01 Nov 2019, 11:11 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pebalap Repsol Honda, Jorge Lorenzo, tak malu-malu mengakui bahwa MotoGP 2019 merupakan periode terburuk dalam karier balapnya. Hal ini ia nyatakan kepada Motorsport.com di sela pekan balap MotoGP Malaysia di Sirkuit Sepang pada Kamis (31/10/2019).
Lorenzo diketahui kesulitan beradaptasi dengan RC213V, dan hingga kini belum juga mampu masuk 10 besar. Tak hanya itu, dalam empat seri terakhir, ia gagal meraih poin. Kesulitan Lorenzo pun makin pelik karena ia kerap dirundung cedera, puncaknya adalah cedera punggung yang ia dapat di Assen.
"Jika Anda lihat Jorge Lorenzo di atas motor apa pun, Anda tahu itu dua. Tapi soal kecepatan, saya jadi tak dikenali bersama Honda di banyak waktu. Saya tak pernah cukup kompetitif kecuali di uji coba Qatar, beberapa lap pertama di Barcelona, atau FP2 di Le Mans. Bahkan finis di posisi lima besar pun tak bisa," tuturnya.
text:
Jorge Lorenzo: 2019 MotoGP Worst Time of My Career
Nov 01 2019, 11:11 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Repsol Honda rider, Jorge Lorenzo, is not shy about admitting that the 2019 MotoGP was the worst period of his racing career. This he stated to Motorsport.com on the sidelines of the Malaysian MotoGP racing week at the Sepang Circuit on Thursday (10/31/2019).
Lorenzo is known to have difficulty adapting to RC213V, and until now has not been able to enter the top 10. Not only that, in the last four series, he failed to win points. Lorenzo's difficulty was even more complicated because he was often plagued by injuries, the peak was a back injury that he got at Assen.
"If you see Jorge Lorenzo on any motorcycle, you know that's two. But about speed, I have not been recognized with Honda for a lot of time. I have never been competitive enough except in the Qatar trials, the first few laps in Barcelona, or FP2 "at Le Mans. You can't even finish in the top five," he said.
